RNS Number : 9235NAVEVA Group PLC03 February 2021

AVEVA Group plc

Director/PDMR Shareholding

AVEVA Group plc announces that on 3 February 2021 it was notified of the following share option exercise and sale of shares which took place:

Steen Lomholt-Thomsen, Chief Revenue Officer

On 2 February 2021 Mr Lomholt-Thomsen exercised options over 25,974 shares at an exercise price of 3 5 / 9 pence per share following the 2017 award under the AVEVA Group Long Term Incentive Plan. All resultant shares were sold at a price of £37.04.
